subject: Bankruptcies
Blackberry (Handheld Device)
lead_paragraph: Jim Balsillie — the co-chief executive of Research In Motion, the maker of BlackBerry — is looking to buy the Coyotes and move them to Ontario. Balsillie said his $212.5 million offer is conditional on the Coyotes relocating, where they existed as the Winnipeg Jets before moving to Phoenix for the 1996-97 season. The team filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection Tuesday.
